price: 49. Y creamos parejas de todas las cosas[972] para que reflexionaran.
arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ
footnotes: [972]  Ver la nota de la aleya 36 de la sura 36.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wamin kulli shayin khalaqnā zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
